name: headily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has a powerful effect and makes you feel slightly drunk or excited: The garden was overgrown with headily fragrant flowers that needed pruning. The administration spoke headily about the new infrastructure project, but many of the residents of the state were still skeptical about whether it was worth the money.
More examplesFewer examplesThe wine that the waiter recommended was headily aromatic and paired well with the duck we had ordered.The short story is about a young wanderer who falls headily in love with the daughter of the man who runs the inn.
